title: Entering a Company From Another World!? - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Ecchi   Fantasy   Harem   Martial Arts   Romance   Shounen
tags: Adapted to Manga   Demon Lord   Demons   Dungeons   Elves   Fantasy World   Game Elements   Level System   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Polygamy   R-15   Summoned Hero   Transported to Another World   Weak to Strong
author: Nanashi Nanami   七士七海
description: Former black company employee, Jiro Tanaka leaves his job due to overwork. In his home, he founds a job recruitment template which is from another world company. The job is to test the dungeon created by the demon king. There, the days of diving into the dungeon as a “dungeon tester” were waiting for him to complete the dungeon that even the hero would not be able to clear. He has a hot dark elf boss who has an amazing ability “Magic resistance”. The New life of our MC starts!>
